summary: Diff adds a new landing-page style App with hero header and one required hero image reference, plus introduces Internet Identity/react-query hooks and a stub backend actor. Due to truncation, several requested sections (features details, how-it-works copy, applications list, contact details, and the other two required images) cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a “Key Features” section displaying the six provided feature items and their descriptions verbatim; responsive single-column on mobile and grid on larger screens.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the start of a “Key Features” section and a grid container, but the actual six feature items and their verbatim descriptions are truncated, so implementation cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a “How It Works” section containing the provided explanation text verbatim and visually distinct from other sections.
missing_requirements.reason: No visible evidence of the “How It Works” section title or the required paragraph text in the provided (truncated) App.tsx excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add an “Applications” section listing Medical Rehab, Assistive Tech, and R&D (Research and Development) exactly.
missing_requirements.reason: No visible evidence of an “Applications” section or the three required items in the provided (truncated) App.tsx excerpt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a “Contact” section showing email (mailto) and both phone numbers (tel) exactly as provided.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt does not show the contact section contents (email/phone values and mailto/tel links), so correctness cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add all three specified generated static images from frontend/public/assets/generated and include descriptive English alt text; images should appear in appropriate sections.
missing_requirements.reason: Only the hero image path and alt text are shown. There is no evidence for the other two required images (workshop use-case and prototype detail) or that they are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend Motoko canister stub (single actor) even though the request was intended to be frontend-only and did not request backend changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states the landing page should be implementable as frontend-only; backend changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/added Internet Identity authentication provider code and an actor hook using react-query.
hallucinated_features.reason: The landing page requirements do not ask for authentication flows or actor/query infrastructure; Internet Identity is explicitly 'not required for this landing page'.

hallucinated_features.description: Added navigation CTAs/buttons ('Contact Us', 'Explore Features', 'How It Works') not explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request CTAs/buttons; only sections/content and contact info display were required.

hallucinated_features.description: Added extra hero badge text 'Soft Robotics Innovation' not part of the provided required copy.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 specifies exact provided copy elements for the hero/header; additional marketing copy was not requested.
